summary.span: 控制 .wav 文件中的声音播放。

span.span: Controls playback of a sound from a .wav file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供用于加载和播放 .wav 文件的简单接口。The class provides a simple interface for loading and playing a .wav file. 类支持从文件路径、URL、 包含 .wav 文件的、或包含 .wav 文件的嵌入资源加载 .wav 文件。The class supports loading a .wav file from a file path, a URL, a that contains a .wav file, or an embedded resource that contains a .wav file. 若要使用类播放声音 ，请使用 .wav 文件的路径配置，并调用一个播放方法。To play a sound using the class, configure a with a path to the .wav file and call one of the play methods. 可以通过使用其中一个构造函数或通过设置 或属性来标识要播放的 .wav 文件。 You can identify the .wav file to play by using one of the constructors or by setting either the or property. 可以通过使用其中一种加载方法在播放之前加载文件，或在调用某个播放方法之前延迟加载。The file can be loaded prior to playing by using one of the load methods, or loading can be deferred until one of the play methods is called. 如果 配置为从或 URL 加载 .wav 文件，则 必须将 .wav 文件加载到内存中，然后才能开始播放。A configured to load a .wav file from a or URL must load the .wav file into memory before playback begins. 可以同步或异步地加载或播放 .wav 文件。You can load or play a .wav file synchronously or asynchronously. 如果调用同步加载或播放方法，则调用线程将等待，直到该方法返回，这可能会导致绘制和其他事件中断。If you call a synchronous load or play method, the calling thread will wait until the method returns, which may cause painting and other events to be interrupted. 调用异步 load 或 play 方法将允许调用线程继续进行而不中断。Calling an asynchronous load or play method will allow the calling thread to continue without interruption. 有关异步方法调用的详细信息，请参阅 [如何：在后台运行操作](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-run-an-operation-in-the-background)。For more information on asynchronous method calls, see [How to: Run an Operation in the Background](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-run-an-operation-in-the-background). 完成加载 .wav 文件后，它会引发 事件。When a has finished loading a .wav file, it raises the event. 您可以 在事件处理程序中检查以确定加载是成功还是失败。You can examine the in your event handler to determine if the load succeeded or failed. 当音频源设置为新文件路径或 URL 时，将引发事件。The event is raised when the audio source is set to a new file path or URL. 当音频源设置为新时，将引发事件 。The event is raised when the audio source is set to a new . 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). 有关的详细信息 ，请参阅 [SoundPlayer 类概述](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/soundplayer-class-overview)。For more information about , see [SoundPlayer Class Overview](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/soundplayer-class-overview). > [!NOTE] > 类无法播放其他文件类型，如 .wma 或 mp3。The class cannot play other file types, such as .wma or .mp3. 如果要播放其他文件类型，可以使用 Windows Media Player 控件。If you want to play other file types, you can use the Windows Media Player control. 有关详细信息，请参阅 Windows Media Player SDK 中的 [在 .NET Framework 解决方案中使用 windows Media Player 控件](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=131267) 和 [Visual Basic .Net 和 c # 的 Windows Media Player 对象模型引用](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=131269) 。For more information, see [Using the Windows Media Player Control in a .NET Framework Solution](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=131267) and [Windows Media Player Object Model Reference for Visual Basic .NET and C#](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=131269) in the Windows Media Player SDK. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 类从本地路径或统一资源标识符（ (URI) ）播放 .wav 文件。The following code example demonstrates the use of the class for playing .wav files from a local path or a Uniform Resource Identifier (URI). [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Sound#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Sound/CPP/soundtestform.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Sound#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Sound/CS/soundtestform.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Sound#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Sound/VB/soundtestform.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数初始化 不带音频源的。This constructor initializes a with no audio source. 在将其配置为使用音频源路径之前， 将在其中一种播放方法发出嘟嘟声。Until it is configured with an audio source path, the will play a beep sound when one of its playback methods is called.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 传递给参数的字符串 `soundLocation` 可以是文件路径，也可以是 .wav 文件的 URL。The string passed to the `soundLocation` parameter can be either a file path or a URL to a .wav file. 如果路径或 URL 无效， 仍将构造，但对 load 或 play 方法的后续调用将失败。If the path or URL is not valid, the will still be constructed, but subsequent calls to a load or play method will fail.

SoundPlayer Class Overview (Windows Forms)

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Load() cil managed

summary.span: 同步加载声音。

span.span: Loads a sound synchronously.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法使用当前线程加载 .wav 文件，使线程无法处理其他消息，直到加载完成为止。The method uses the current thread to load a .wav file, preventing the thread from handling other messages until the load is complete. > [!CAUTION] > 此 方法可能会在加载大的 .wav 文件时产生延迟。The method may produce a delay while loading a large .wav file. 此外，在完成加载之前，将阻止绘制和其他事件。In addition, painting and other events will be blocked until the load is completed. 使用 方法异步加载声音，这允许调用线程继续进行而不中断。Use the method to load a sound asynchronously, which allows the calling thread to continue without interruption. 此方法 在加载完成时引发事件，即使加载未成功。This method raises the event when loading completes, even if the load was not successful. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法将 .wav 文件附加到类的实例 。The following code example demonstrates the use of the method to attach a .wav file to an instance of the class. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Sound#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Sound/CPP/soundtestform.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Sound#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Sound/CS/soundtestform.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Sound#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Sound/VB/soundtestform.vb#2)]

exception.span: 加载所用的时间超出了 指定的时间（以毫秒为单位）。

span.span: The elapsed time during loading exceeds the time, in milliseconds, specified by .

exception.span: 找不到 指定的文件。

SoundPlayer Class Overview (Windows Forms)

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void LoadAsync() cil managed

summary.span: 使用新线程从流或 Web 资源中加载 .wav 文件。

span.span: Loads a .wav file from a stream or a Web resource using a new thread.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果将 配置为从 或 Web 资源加载 .wav 文件，则此方法将使用新线程开始从位置加载 .wav 文件。If a is configured to load a .wav file from a or Web resource, this method begins loading a .wav file from the location using a new thread. 此方法 在加载完成时引发事件，即使加载未成功。This method raises the event when loading completes, even if the load was not successful. 如果将 配置为从本地文件路径加载 .wav 文件，则此方法不执行任何操作，因为加载会推迟到开始播放。If a is configured to load a .wav file from a local file path, this method does nothing, because loading is deferred until playing begins. 有关异步加载的详细信息，请参阅 [如何：在 Windows 窗体内异步加载声音](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-load-a-sound-asynchronously-within-a-windows-form)。For more information about asynchronous loading, see [How to: Load a Sound Asynchronously within a Windows Form](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-load-a-sound-asynchronously-within-a-windows-form). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 方法以异步方式加载 .wav 文件以供类的实例使用 。The following code example demonstrates the use of the method to asynchronously load a .wav file for use by an instance of the class. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Sound#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Sound/CPP/soundtestform.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Sound#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Sound/CS/soundtestform.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Sound#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Sound/VB/soundtestform.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event LoadCompleted As AsyncCompletedEventHandler

summary.span: 当成功或未成功加载 .wav 文件时出现。

span.span: Occurs when a .wav file has been successfully or unsuccessfully loaded.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 .wav 文件的加载完成时，将引发此事件。This event is raised when loading of a .wav file is complete. 事件参数指示声音的加载已成功还是失败。The event arguments indicate whether the load of the sound was completed successfully or failed. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示 如何使用事件处理程序接收指示 .wav 文件内容已加载的通知。The following code example demonstrates the use of the event handler to receive a notification indicating that the contents of a .wav file have been loaded. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Sound#8](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Sound/CPP/soundtestform.cpp#8)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Sound#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Sound/CS/soundtestform.cs#8)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Sound#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Sound/VB/soundtestform.vb#8)]

summary.span: 获取或设置 .wav 文件的加载必须完成的时间（以毫秒为单位）。

span.span: Gets or sets the time, in milliseconds, in which the .wav file must load.
The number of milliseconds to wait.
The default is 10000 (10 seconds).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此时间到期后，将取消加载并 引发异常。After this time has expired, the loading is canceled and a exception is thrown.

span.span: An that contains the event data.

summary.span: 引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 .wav 文件的加载完成时，将调用此方法。This method is called when loading of a .wav file is complete. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当已设置此的新音频源路径时，将调用此方法 。This method is called when a new audio source path for this has been set. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅如何：提供事件功能和 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information, see How to: Provide Event functionality and [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

summary.span: 使用新线程播放 .wav 文件，如果尚未加载 .wav 文件，则先加载该文件。

span.span: Plays the .wav file using a new thread, and loads the .wav file first if it has not been loaded.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法使用新线程播放声音。The method plays the sound using a new thread. 如果在将 .wav 文件加载到内存中之前调用，则会先加载 .wav 文件，然后才能开始播放。If you call before the .wav file has been loaded into memory, the .wav file will be loaded before playback starts. 您可以使用 或 方法来提前将 .wav 文件加载到内存中。You can use the or method to load the .wav file to memory in advance. 从或 URL 成功加载 .wav 文件后，对 的播放方法的后续调用 将无需重新加载 .wav 文件，直至声音的路径更改。After a .wav file is successfully loaded from a or URL, future calls to playback methods for the will not need to reload the .wav file until the path for the sound changes. 如果未指定 .wav 文件或未能加载 .wav 文件，则该 方法将播放默认的嘟嘟声。If the .wav file has not been specified or it fails to load, the method will play the default beep sound. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示 如何使用方法异步播放 .wav 文件。The following code example demonstrates the use of the method to asynchronously play a .wav file. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Sound#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Sound/CPP/soundtestform.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Sound#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Sound/CS/soundtestform.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Sound#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Sound/VB/soundtestform.vb#5)]

span.span: The elapsed time during loading exceeds the time, in milliseconds, specified by .

summary.span: 使用新线程循环播放 .wav 文件，如果尚未加载 .wav 文件，则先加载该文件。

span.span: Plays and loops the .wav file using a new thread, and loads the .wav file first if it has not been loaded.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法使用新线程播放和循环声音。The method plays and loops the sound using a new thread. 如果在将 .wav 文件加载到内存中之前调用，则会先加载 .wav 文件，然后才能开始播放。If you call before the .wav file has been loaded into memory, the .wav file will be loaded before playback starts. 您可以使用 或 方法来提前将 .wav 文件加载到内存中。You can use the or method to load the .wav file to memory in advance. 从或 URL 成功加载 .wav 文件后，对 的播放方法的后续调用 将无需重新加载 .wav 文件，直至声音的路径更改。After a .wav file is successfully loaded from a or URL, future calls to playback methods for the will not need to reload the .wav file until the path for the sound changes. 如果未指定 .wav 文件或未能加载 .wav 文件，则该 方法将播放默认的嘟嘟声。If the .wav file has not been specified or it fails to load, the method will play the default beep sound. 有关的详细信息 ，请参阅 [如何：在 Windows 窗体上循环播放声音](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-loop-a-sound-playing-on-a-windows-form)。For more information about , see [How to: Loop a Sound Playing on a Windows Form](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-loop-a-sound-playing-on-a-windows-form). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 方法重复播放 .wav 文件。The following code example demonstrates the use of the method to repeatedly play a .wav file. 在调用方法之前，将播放 .wav。 The .wav will be played until the method is called. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Sound#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Sound/CPP/soundtestform.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Sound#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Sound/CS/soundtestform.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Sound#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Sound/VB/soundtestform.vb#6)]

exception.span: 加载所用的时间超出了 指定的时间（以毫秒为单位）。

span.span: The elapsed time during loading exceeds the time, in milliseconds, specified by .

exception.span: 找不到 指定的文件。

span.span: The file specified by cannot be found.

exception.span: .wav 标头已损坏；由 指定的文件不是 PCM .wav 文件。

span.span: The .wav header is corrupted; the file specified by is not a PCM .wav file.
SoundPlayer Class Overview (Windows Forms)

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void PlaySync() cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: [System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")]

summary.span: 播放 .wav 文件，如果尚未加载 .wav 文件，则先加载该文件。

span.span: Plays the .wav file and loads the .wav file first if it has not been loaded.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法使用当前线程来播放 .wav 文件，使线程无法处理其他消息，直到加载完成为止。The method uses the current thread to play a .wav file, preventing the thread from handling other messages until the load is complete. 您可以使用 或 方法来提前将 .wav 文件加载到内存中。You can use the or method to load the .wav file to memory in advance. 从或 URL 成功加载 .wav 文件后，对 的播放方法的后续调用 将无需重新加载 .wav 文件，直至声音的路径更改。After a .wav file is successfully loaded from a or URL, future calls to playback methods for the will not need to reload the .wav file until the path for the sound changes. 如果未指定 .wav 文件或未能加载 .wav 文件，则该 方法将播放默认的嘟嘟声。If the .wav file has not been specified or it fails to load, the method will play the default beep sound. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示 如何使用方法同步播放 .wav 文件。The following code example demonstrates the use of the method to synchronously play a .wav file. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.PlaySync#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.PlaySync/CPP/system.windows.forms.sound.playasync.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.PlaySync#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.PlaySync/CS/system.windows.forms.sound.playasync.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.PlaySync#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.PlaySync/VB/system.windows.forms.sound.playasync.vb#1)]

exception.span: 加载所用的时间超出了 指定的时间（以毫秒为单位）。

span.span: The elapsed time during loading exceeds the time, in milliseconds, specified by .

span.span: The .wav header is corrupted; the file specified by is not a PCM .wav file.

The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当已设置此的新音频源路径时，将引发此事件 。This event is raised when a new audio source path for this has been set. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 事件处理程序在 附加到不同的 .wav 文件时接收通知。The following code example demonstrates the use of the event handler to receive a notification when the has been attached to a different .wav file. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Sound#9](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Sound/CPP/soundtestform.cpp#9)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Sound#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Sound/CS/soundtestform.cs#9)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Sound#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Sound/VB/soundtestform.vb#9)]
